mean_en: a public holiday in the US (on the fourth Thursday in November) and in Canada (on the second Monday in October), originally to give thanks to God for the harvest and for health; the expression of thanks to God
sentence: Roast turkey is a traditional food served on Thanksgiving.
sentence_trans: 烤火鸡是感恩节的传统食物。
word_etyma: thank感谢 + s复数 + giv给予 + ing名词后缀 → Thanksgiving感恩节
